pages.speaker: grunt1
lines: What's up, Mr. Gym Leader? Me and my buddy have a message straight from our boss.

pages.speaker: mobi0
lines: Team What? What do you want with me?

pages.speaker: grunt1
lines: Our boss heard about your past exploits, Mr. Mobi. The whole organized crime shebang.

pages.speaker: mobi
lines: If your boss knows as much about me as he claims, he should know that sending you here was nothing but a fool's errand! I left that life behind.

pages.speaker: grunt1
lines: Really? Your grip on Yache City suggests otherwise.

pages.speaker: mobi
lines: I am protecting Yache City from people like you. Hooligans, indeed. Leave Yache City at once!

pages.speaker: mobi
lines: Do not lie to me, boy. If you think you can strongarm me into joining your so-called team, you are beyond foolish.

pages.speaker: grunt1
lines: We don't think we can, Mr. Gym Leader. You're going to join us. Otherwise, we might just have to break some stuffâ€¦

pages.speaker: mobi
lines: Foolish, indeed! You, there. Help me teach these hooligans a lesson!

pages.speaker: player
lines: What was I supposed to do?!??
